name: Attack of Angry Zombies - Soldier Defense
name_original: Attack of Angry Zombies - Soldier Defense
description:
Test your skills shooting while running, even running upside down! This is dangerous territory! Zombies everywhere and they are out for you. Shoot them when you have the chance, Collect coins while running along the terrain. Choose from several amazing characters and several worlds. This is your mission. You decide. Imagine running for your life while listening to cool music and dodging or shooting obstacles. Exciting fun and challenging.

HOW TO PLAY:

Press the lower left of screen to jump. Your character will flip upside down. You can run along various level platforms or even upside down on the ceiling. Press the lower right to shoot. Collect coins to unlock new soldiers and worlds.

-Amazing Graphics
-Cool Sounds
-Exciting Soldiers

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!

EXCITING FUN!!

Download ‘Attack of Angry Zombies’ now and save the world!!!
